channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:13 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow further reports.
item.description: 游댮 01:13 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
